citadels

Class CharacterDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • citadels.state.CharacterDeckTest

  • public class CharacterDeck
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the districtDeck of character cards used during the selection phase. Supports drawing, shuffling, and resetting the districtDeck.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CharacterDeck(java.util.List<CharacterCard> characterCards)
      Constructs a new character districtDeck using the provided list of character cards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CharacterCard draw()
      Draws and removes the top character card from the districtDeck.
      java.util.List<CharacterCard> getCards()
      Returns the internal list of character cards.
      void setCards(java.util.List<CharacterCard> cards)
      Replaces the current districtDeck with a new list of character cards.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the character districtDeck randomly.
      int size()
      Returns the number of character cards left in the districtDeck.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CharacterDeck

        public CharacterDeck(java.util.List<CharacterCard> characterCards)
        Constructs a new character districtDeck using the provided list of character cards. The districtDeck is automatically shuffled.
        Parameters:
        characterCards - The initial list of character cards

    • Method Detail

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the character districtDeck randomly.

      • draw

        public CharacterCard draw()
        Draws and removes the top character card from the districtDeck.
        Returns:
        The top character card, or null if the districtDeck is empty

      • setCards

        public void setCards(java.util.List<CharacterCard> cards)
        Replaces the current districtDeck with a new list of character cards. Useful for reloading the districtDeck from saved game state.
        Parameters:
        cards - The new list of character cards

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of character cards left in the districtDeck.
        Returns:
        Size of the districtDeck

      • getCards

        public java.util.List<CharacterCard> getCards()
        Returns the internal list of character cards. Use with care â€” changes affect the actual districtDeck.
        Returns:
        List of character cards
